verses.verse: For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> <S%H853>on<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and will <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5117>set<s%> them <S%H5921>in<s%> their own <S%H127>land:<s%> and the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> shall be <S%H3867>joined<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> them, and they shall <S%H5596>cleave<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> them, and <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H413>to<s%> their <S%H4725>place:<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H5157>possess<s%> them <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for <S%H5650>servants<s%> and <S%H8198>handmaids:<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>take<s%> them <S%H7617>captives,<s%> whose <S%H7617>captives<s%> they were; and they shall rule <S%H7287>over<s%> their <S%H5065>oppressors.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall give thee <S%H5117>rest<s%> from thy <S%H4480>sorrow,<s%> <S%H6090><s%> and from thy <S%H4480>fear,<s%> <S%H7267><s%> and <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H7186>hard<s%> <S%H5656>bondage<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> thou wast made to <S%H5647>serve,<s%>

That thou shalt take <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4912>proverb<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> hath the <S%H5065>oppressor<s%> <S%H7673>ceased!<s%> the golden <S%H4062>city<s%> <S%H7673>ceased!<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and the <S%H7626>scepter<s%> of the <S%H4910>rulers.<s%>

He who <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in <S%H5678>wrath<s%> with a continual <S%H1115>stroke,<s%> <S%H5627><s%> <S%H4347><s%> he that <S%H7287>ruled<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> in <S%H639>anger,<s%> is <S%H4783>persecuted,<s%> and <S%H1097>none<s%> <S%H2820>hindereth.<s%>
The <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> is at <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and is <S%H8252>quiet:<s%> they break <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>singing.<s%>

Yea, <S%H1571><s%> the fir <S%H1265>trees<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> at thee, and the <S%H730>cedars<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> saying, <S%H4480>Since<s%> <S%H227><s%> thou art laid <S%H7901>down,<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3772>feller<s%> is come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us.

Hell <S%H7585><s%> from <S%H4480>beneath<s%> <S%H8478><s%> is <S%H7264>moved<s%> for thee to <S%H7122>meet<s%> thee at thy <S%H935>coming:<s%> it stirreth <S%H5782>up<s%> the <S%H7496>dead<s%> for thee, even <S%H3605>all<s%> the chief <S%H6260>ones<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> it hath raised <S%H6965>up<s%> from their <S%H4480>thrones<s%> <S%H3678><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> they shall <S%H6030>speak<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> unto thee, Art <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> become <S%H2470>weak<s%> as we? art thou become <S%H4911>like<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> us?

Thy <S%H1347>pomp<s%> is brought <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave,<s%> and the <S%H1998>noise<s%> of thy <S%H5035>viols:<s%> the <S%H7415>worm<s%> is <S%H3331>spread<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> thee, and the <S%H8438>worms<s%> <S%H4374>cover<s%> thee.

How <S%H349><s%> art thou <S%H5307>fallen<s%> from <S%H4480>heaven,<s%> <S%H8064><s%> O <S%H1966>Lucifer,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning!<s%> how art thou cut <S%H1438>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> which didst <S%H2522>weaken<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H1471>nations!<s%>

For <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H559>said<s%> in thine <S%H3824>heart,<s%> I will <S%H5927>ascend<s%> into <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> I will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> my <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H410>God:<s%> I will <S%H3427>sit<s%> also upon the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> in the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the north: <S%H6828><s%>
I will <S%H5927>ascend<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H1116>heights<s%> of the <S%H5645>clouds;<s%> I will be <S%H1819>like<s%> the most <S%H5945>High.<s%>
Yet <S%H389><s%> thou shalt be brought <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H7585>hell,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

They that <S%H7200>see<s%> thee shall narrowly <S%H7688>look<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> thee, and <S%H995>consider<s%> thee, saying, Is <S%H2088>this<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> that made the <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H7264>tremble,<s%> that did <S%H7493>shake<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms;<s%>

That <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> as a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H2040>destroyed<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof; that <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H615>prisoners?<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> of them, <S%H7901>lie<s%> in <S%H3519>glory,<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> in his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But <S%H859>thou<s%> art <S%H7993>cast<s%> out of thy <S%H4480>grave<s%> <S%H6913><s%> like an <S%H8581>abominable<s%> <S%H5342>branch,<s%> and as the <S%H3830>raiment<s%> of those that are <S%H2026>slain,<s%> thrust <S%H2944>through<s%> with a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> that go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H953>pit;<s%> as a <S%H6297>carcass<s%> trodden under <S%H947>feet.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3161>joined<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them in <S%H6900>burial,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> thou hast <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> thy <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H2026>slain<s%> thy <S%H5971>people:<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers<s%> shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> be <S%H7121>renowned.<s%>

Prepare <S%H3559><s%> <S%H4293>slaughter<s%> for his <S%H1121>children<s%> for the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers;<s%> that they do <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H6965>rise,<s%> nor <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> nor <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> with <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

For I will rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon<s%> the <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H7605>remnant,<s%> and <S%H5209>son,<s%> and <S%H5220>nephew,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

I will also <S%H7760>make<s%> it a <S%H4180>possession<s%> for the <S%H7090>bittern,<s%> and <S%H98>pools<s%> of <S%H4325>water:<s%> and I will <S%H2894>sweep<s%> it with the <S%H4292>broom<s%> of <S%H8045>destruction,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H7650>sworn,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>Surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I have <S%H1819>thought,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall it come to <S%H1961>pass;<s%> and <S%H834>as<s%> I have <S%H3289>purposed,<s%> so shall <S%H1931>it<s%> stand: <S%H6965><s%>

That I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> in my <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H2022>mountains<s%> tread him under <S%H947>foot:<s%> then shall his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> them, and his <S%H5448>burden<s%> <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> their <S%H7926>shoulders.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H6098>purpose<s%> that is <S%H3289>purposed<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth:<s%> and <S%H2063>this<s%> is the <S%H3027>hand<s%> that is stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H3289>purposed,<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H6565>disannul<s%> it? and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is stretched <S%H5186>out,<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> shall turn it <S%H7725>back?<s%>
In the <S%H8141>year<s%> that <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H4194>died<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4853>burden.<s%>

Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thou, <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6429>Philistia,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of him <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> thee is <S%H7665>broken:<s%> for out of the serpent's <S%H4480>root<s%> <S%H8328><s%> <S%H5175><s%> shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H6848>cockatrice,<s%> and his <S%H6529>fruit<s%> shall be a fiery flying <S%H8314>serpent.<s%> <S%H5774><s%>

And the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%> shall <S%H7462>feed,<s%> and the <S%H34>needy<s%> shall lie <S%H7257>down<s%> in <S%H983>safety:<s%> and I will <S%H4191>kill<s%> thy <S%H8328>root<s%> with <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and he shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> thy <S%H7611>remnant.<s%>

Howl, <S%H3213><s%> O <S%H8179>gate;<s%> <S%H2199>cry,<s%> O <S%H5892>city;<s%> thou, <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6429>Philistia,<s%> art <S%H4127>dissolved:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> there shall <S%H935>come<s%> from the <S%H4480>north<s%> <S%H6828><s%> a <S%H6227>smoke,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall be <S%H909>alone<s%> in his appointed <S%H4151>times.<s%>

What <S%H4100><s%> shall one then <S%H6030>answer<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of the <S%H1471>nation?<s%> <S%H3588>That<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3245>founded<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and the <S%H6041>poor<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H2620>trust<s%> in it.
